00436 #ifndef __NO_GENERIC_IOSTREAM
00437         friend std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os, const IndividualMOO& ind )
00438         {
00439 //              printf("IndividualMOO::operator << \n"); fflush(stdout);
00440 
00441                 os << "IndividualMOO(" << ind.size( ) << ")\n"
00442                         << ind.fitness       << '\n'
00443                         << ind.scaledFitness << '\n'
00444                         << ind.evalFlg       << '\n'
00445                         << ind.feasible      << '\n'
00446                         << ind.selProb       << '\n'
00447                         << ind.numCopies     << '\n'
00448                         << ind.elitist       << '\n'
00449                         << ind.age           << '\n'      
00450                         << ind.learnTime     << '\n'    
00451                         << ind.getNoOfDisplVal()        << '\n'
00452                         << ind.MOORank                          << '\n'
00453                         << ind.MOOShare;
00454 
00455                 int r, rc;
00456 
00457                 rc = ind.MOOFitness.size();
00458                 os << '\n' << rc;
00459                 for (r=0; r<rc; r++)
00460                         os << '\n' << ind.MOOFitness[r];
00461 
00462                 rc = ind.UnpenalizedMOOFitness.size();
00463                 os << '\n' << rc;
00464                 for (r=0; r<rc; r++)
00465                         os << '\n' << ind.UnpenalizedMOOFitness[r];
00466 
00467                 // added by Stefan Wiegand 07.01.2004
00468                 for(unsigned ii=0; ii<ind.getNoOfDisplVal();ii++)
00469                         os << '\n' << ind.getDisplVal(ii);
00470                 os << std::endl;
00471 
00472                 for( unsigned i = 0; i < ind.size( ); ++i )
00473                         os << '\n' << ind[ i ];
00474                 os << std::endl;
00475 
00476                 return os;
00477     }
00478 
00479         friend std::istream& operator >> ( std::istream& is, IndividualMOO& ind )
00480         {
00481 //              printf("IndividualMOO::operator >> \n"); fflush(stdout);
00482 
00483                 unsigned i, indSize( 0 );
00484                 std::string s, t;
00485                 double e;
00486 
00487                 is >> s;
00488                 is.get( );   // skip end of line
00489 
00490                 if( is.good( ) &&
00491                         s.substr( 0, 14 ) == "IndividualMOO(" &&
00492                         s.find( ')' ) != std::string::npos )
00493                 {
00494                         // Extract the size indication from the string:
00495                         t = s.substr( s.find( '(' )+1, s.find( ')' ) - s.find( '(' ) - 1 );
00496                         indSize = atoi( t.c_str( ) );
00497 
00498                         // Adapt size of Individual:
00499                         ind.resize( indSize );
00500 
00501                         is >> ind.fitness
00502                                 >> ind.scaledFitness
00503                                 >> ind.evalFlg
00504                                 >> ind.feasible
00505                                 >> ind.selProb
00506                                 >> ind.numCopies
00507                                 >> ind.elitist
00508                                 >> ind.age
00509                                 >> ind.learnTime
00510                                 >> ind.noDisplVal
00511                                 >> ind.MOORank
00512                                 >> ind.MOOShare;
00513 
00514                         int r, rc;
00515 
00516                         is >> rc;
00517                         ind.MOOFitness.resize(rc);
00518                         for (r=0; r<rc; r++)
00519                                 is >> ind.MOOFitness[r];
00520 
00521                         is >> rc;
00522                         ind.UnpenalizedMOOFitness.resize(rc);
00523                         for (r=0; r<rc; r++)
00524                                 is >> ind.UnpenalizedMOOFitness[r];
00525 
00526                         // added by Stefan Wiegand 07.01.2004
00527                         ind.initDisplVal(ind.getNoOfDisplVal());
00528                         for(i=0; i<ind.getNoOfDisplVal();i++)
00529                         {
00530                                 is >> e;
00531                                 ind.setDisplVal(i,e);
00532                         }
00533 
00534                         for( i = 0; i < ind.size( ); ++i )
00535                         {
00536                                 int pos = is.tellg();
00537                                 is >> s;
00538                                 is.seekg(pos, std::ios_base::beg);
00539                                 t = s.substr(s.find('<' )+1, s.find('>') - s.find('<' ) - 1);
00540                                 const char* type = t.c_str();
00541 
00542                                 Chromosome* pC = CreateChromosome(type);
00543                                 ind.replace(i, *pC);
00544                                 is >> ind[ i ]; 
00545                         }
00546                 }
00547                 return is;
00548         }
00549 #endif // !__NO_GENERIC_IOSTREAM
00550

00555   unsigned         MOORank;
00556   double           MOOShare;
00557 };
